english.segment1: Daydreaming again. Trying to get my mind together. Seeing what could be. Will it take forever
english.segment2: Let me have this moment. Let me take this moment for myself. Silence oh so sweet. Silence shared with someone else
english.segment3: Wanting to escape. I close my eyes. And all the day's confusion. Just passes by
english.segment4: My only release. Is to call on You. A comforting conversation. A message is getting through
english.segment5: This is my time this is my time. This is ours to share. This is my time this is my time. This is my time
